name: iViioo
tag_list: video-services, video-email, video-message, video-api, computing-cloud, video-interview, video-job-interview, video-recruiting, recruiting-process-outsourcing, human-resources, human-resource-management, human-capital-management, recruitment-process
overview:
iViioo [I-View] provides scalable web-based video services and makes them easy to use and accessible for everyone.

iViioo innovates by using dynamic and fresh web technologies to enrich users’ online video communication experiences. iViioo offers a global video services platform with which enterprises and developers can build scalable online video applications on one of world’s largest computing clouds. It reduces the time and cost of building new video applications.

Currently iViioo has 2 major product lines:

  1. iViioo Express: an e-recruiting video job interview service for hiring organizations and HR professionals to identify, review, and select top candidates.
  2. iViioo V-Mail: online web-based video mail services for everyone to send and receive secure video messages.
